entry.string: Current Conditions Cache time isn't long enough
entry.translation: Coorrent Cundeeshuns Ceche-a teeme-a isn't lung inuoogh

entry.string: Please enter a Cache Time longer than or equal to 30 minutes for the Current Conditions Cache Time.
entry.translation: Pleese-a inter a Ceche-a Teeme-a lunger thun oor iqooel tu 30 meenootes fur zee Coorrent Cundeeshuns Ceche-a Teeme-a.

entry.string: Extended Forecast Cache time isn't long enough
entry.translation: Extended Furecest Ceche-a teeme-a isn't lung inuoogh

entry.string: Please enter a Cache Time longer than or equal to 2 hours for the Extended Forecast Cache Time.
entry.translation: Pleese-a inter a Ceche-a Teeme-a lunger thun oor iqooel tu 2 huoors fur zee Ixtended Furecest Ceche-a Teeme-a.
